catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 636
description: abstracted mountain landscape with tan field in foreground with line of green trees behind it; grey middle ground with darker grey lines; medium to dark blue mountains with lavender and grey clouds; orange at top of sky

medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Fuji (Sanjūroku Fuji 三十六富士)
title: Autumn Clouds at Jūrigi
